text: thumb Hendrica Wilhelmina Petronella Maria Agatha "Herna" Verhagen (born 1966) is a Dutch businesswoman, the chief executive (CEO) of PostNL since 2012. In 2020, Verhagen was appointed by NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg to join a group of experts to support his work in a reflection process to further strengthen NATO’s political dimension.Secretary General appoints group as part of NATO reflection process NATO, press release of 31 March 2020. Verhagen has a master's degree in Law from Nijmegen University, and a master's degree in Human Resources from Tilburg University. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Dutch businesspeople Category:Dutch chief executives Category:Living people
title: Herna Verhagen
